Home » 33Y5 Saccayamakapāḷi » 2 Pavattivāra » 2.2 Nirodhavāra » 2.2.3 Anāgatavāra
2.2.3.3 Anulomapuggalokāsa
Pavattivāra
Nirodhavāra
Anāgatavāra
Anulomapuggalokāsa
100.
522»  Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṃ nirujjhissati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhissatīti?
523Aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ arahantānaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhissati. Itaresaṃ catuvokārānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca nirujjhissati samudayasaccañca nirujjhissati…pe… .
524(Yassakampi yassayatthakampi sadisaṃ.)
